attributes.action: Make Captain Tom Moore a knight immediately.
attributes.background:
I for one am extremely proud of Captain Tom Moore who had already given our country more than most of us before uniting and inspiring us in this selfless, brave act of kindness.  

Please join me in asking parliament to make him a knight so he knows his country  is as proud of him as he is of us.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
